channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Total Protection (MTP)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee,LLC -- McAfee Total Protection (MTP)

item.title: CVE-2021-23873|2024-08-03T19:14:09.882Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.30 allows a local user to gain elevated privileges and perform arbitrary file deletion as the SYSTEM user potentially causing Denial of Service via manipulating Junction link, after enumerating certain files, at a specific time.

item.title: CVE-2021-23876|2024-08-03T19:14:09.349Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Bypass Remote Procedure call in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.30 allows a local user to gain elevated privileges and perform arbitrary file modification as the SYSTEM user potentially causing Denial of Service via executing carefully constructed malware.

item.title: CVE-2021-23874|2024-08-03T19:14:09.385Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Arbitrary Process Execution vulnerability in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.30 allows a local user to gain elevated privileges and execute arbitrary code bypassing MTP self-defense.

item.title: CVE-2021-23872|2024-08-03T19:14:09.378Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in the File Lock component of McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.32 allows a local user to gain elevated privileges by manipulating a symbolic link in the IOCTL interface.

item.title: CVE-2021-23891|2024-08-03T19:14:09.739Z -- mcafee%2Cllc -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.32 allows a local user to gain elevated privileges by impersonating a client token which could lead to the bypassing of MTP self-defense.
